1.title: Season Preview
1.plot: Take a look into the upcoming Season of Alpha Girls! Surviving Fashion Week, working with new collaborators, launching new enterprises and performing in a new country? It takes an Alpha Girl to conquer all.

2.title: The Beginning
2.plot: Meet Soo Joo's family and learn more about her injury/ Toki lands in Korea and experiences the Korean music scene/ Mina meets with Jay Park for dinner and takes off for LA/ Lanie tell us about her crazy plans for Vegas

3.title: Calm Before the Storm
3.plot: Soo Joo meets with her agency on how to tackle Fashion Week/ Toki prepares and performs at her first Korean gig/ Mina arrives in Las Vegas and waits to meet Tyga & Pharrell/ Lanie puts on a "ratchorlette party" for her friend despite Trade Show.

4.title: Play Time Is Over
4.plot: Soo Joo goes to casting calls for Jeremy Scott and others/ Toki kills her first Korean gig & chats with Woo Young from 2PM/ Mina collaborates with D9 Reserve and waits to meet Pharrell/ Lanie deals with internal team drama at Fashion Trade Show.

5.title: Work Work Work
5.plot: Soo Joo starts Fashion Week despite injury/ Toki arrives at Ansan Valley Rock Festival/ Mina finally meets Pharrell before his Las Vegas show/ Lanie completes Trade Show and the bachelorette party.

6.title: Beginning of the End
6.plot: Soo Joo networks at Vogue/H&M's Fashion Night Out/ Toki kills it in Korea and says goodbye to her new friends/ Mina leaves Vegas and meets up with Ben Baller in LA/ Lanie parties with The Hundreds up in Hollywood.

7.title: New Ventures
7.plot: Soo Joo kills Fashion Week and awaits more casting calls/ Toki records a new track and performs in downtown LA/ Mina prepares for her first art show in LA/ Lanie gets ready to open her first store in the Philippines.

8.title: The End
8.plot: Soo Joo works the Jeremy Scott fashion runway/ Toki headlines her own show in NY/ Mina wraps up her first art show in LA/ Lanie launches the grand opening of Labism in the Philippines.

imdb.plot outline: Alpha Girls follows four jet-setting, career driven girls at the top of their creative games as they juggle work, relationships and everything in between to grow their brand and themselves personally. Capturing the essence of their hustle and the drama of their everyday lives, Alpha Girls will reveal each of their individual and universal journeys as they work with some of the biggest names in the music and fashion industries.
imdb.title: Alpha Girls
plot: _Alpha Girls_ (qv) follows four jet-setting, career driven girls at the top of their creative games as they juggle work, relationships and everything in between to grow their brand and themselves personally. Capturing the essence of their hustle and the drama of their everyday lives, _Alpha Girls_ (qv) will reveal each of their individual and universal journeys as they work with some of the biggest names in the music and fashion industries.::Mnet America
